title.narrative: Green Diplomacy and Climate wish to tender for Appraisal of Urban Water Supply Programme 2022-2026 - Mali

description.narrative:
The objective of the appraisal is to assess the relevance, cost-effectiveness and sustainability of the individual projects under the bilateral programme, the relevance and justification against the country’s development needs and key challenges, donor complementarity. The appraisal shall further assess the Theory of Change and the validity of the underlying assumptions, the proposed management set-up of the planned projects including financial management, risk mitigation, and monitoring.
The appraisal mission will not include a detailed review the suggested water supply project in the town of Kayes as this project has been prepared and approved by the KfW according to its own procedures. However, the appraisal team is expected to assess the relevance and expected results of the Danish contribution as well as the management modalities proposed for the delegated cooperation.
